sentences.english: Dead-zone operator is adopted in the adaptive algorithm, which improves the robustness of the algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 自適應算法中採用了死區算子，增強了算法的魯棒性。

sentences.english: Dead-zone operator is adopted in the adaptive algorithm to improve the algorithm's robustness.
sentences.chinese: 自適應算法中採用了死區算子，增強了算法的魯棒性。

sentences.english: A predictive algorithm of dead-time compensation is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一種對死區時間的預測補償。

sentences.english: This paper puts forward the method of intelligent compensation of dead zone in electrohydraulic proportional directional valve.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了電液比例方向閥死區的一種智能補償方法。

sentences.english: The effects of the dead-time on the output voltage waveforms of thePWM inverter are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對死區時間對逆變器輸出電壓的影響進行了分析。
